resources.string:
Created by Alex Morgan. 

Kitten image service provided by placekitten. Individual image attributions can be found on their site.
http://placekitten.com/ 

Picasso by Square is used for image loading. 
http://square.github.io/picasso/ 

Explosion Field by tyrantgit is used for the explosion effect. 
https://github.com/tyrantgit/ExplosionField
